channel.title: Gothic Series
channel.description: So the Gothix Series is on sale at the moment on Steam. Can anybody verify if the game is any good perhaps if you have played it before? I've been looking for a decent RPG to play and for the price it seems right but I don't want something where the controls or something is going to be iffy.

item.title: Gothic Series

item.description:

So the Gothix Series is on sale at the moment on Steam. Can anybody verify if the game is any good perhaps if you have played it before? I’ve been looking for a decent RPG to play and for the price it seems right but I don’t want something where the controls or something is going to be iffy.
